{"text":"Variables

Eterna - Raw enchanting power (max 30)
Quanta - Chaos factor that adds randomness
Arcana - Chance to roll enchantments twice
Rectification - Reduces negative Quanta effects"}

{"text":"How to Use

1. Place blocks around the table (5x5x3 range)
2. Right-click with an enchantable item
3. Add lapis lazuli
4. Click enchant button

Different blocks affect the 4 variables differently."}
